name: Bicycle
description: My client is aged 38 and is currently homeless. He has been observed to be independant as he has been working as a grab food deliverer, not depending on Financial Assistance until recently when his handphone and bicycle got stolen away. Client requests for a working bicycle so that he can continue working as a grab food deliverer.

name: Bicycle
description: Client (Female, 24) wants to work as a food delivery rider as she is in-between jobs and has to financially support her father in his debt. Thus, she would benefit from having a bicycle.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Gracia Leong

name: Bicycle with Child Seat
description: Single mum with a primary school age child requiring an adult bicycle (fitted with a child seat) to ferry child to school.

contact.org: Fei Yue Family Service Centre @ Bukit Batok
contact.name: Victoria Chong

name: Motorised Wheelchair
description:
Client has multiple health issues 
(i.e. vein surgery in Sep 2020, minor arm fractures and toe incident in Apr 2021), which resulted in an open wound due to poor compliance to treatment (as a result of low finances) and reduced mobility. She requires the aid of mobility scooter and a walking aid to remain ambulant. Without the motorized wheelchair, Mdm Saradha is not able to head to work. Currently, she is borrowing from her friend who charges $30/ day and this adds on to her accumulated debts. Her daily meals usually include only coffee with biscuits.

name: Wheelchair
description: Client is single parent with 5 children. Client is currently suffering from depression and has difficulty sustaining employment. Client's son has fractured his right foot and will require a wheelchair to travel to school.

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Queenstown
contact.name: Ting Yun

name: Motorize wheelchair
description: Client is an elderly man with diabetes. Due to water retention he is not able to walk very well. His elderly wife is unable to push him on a wheelchair, and he has a frozen shoulder, making it difficult to wheel himself. As such, he would like to request for a motorized wheelchair so he can move around more easily

contact.org: Care Corner Family Service Centre - Tampines
contact.name: Yvette Lau

name: Wheelchair
description: Low-income family is in need of a wheelchair as their current one is too small. Requires one which can withstand weight up to 120kg.

contact.org: AMKFSC Community Services Ltd - Cheng San
contact.name: Lee Yan Jun

name: Electronic wheelchair
description: Client is a 53yo whose right leg was amputated in Y2017 due to diabetes. As a result, client has is unable to seek employment and currently depends financially on 24yo son is a private hire driver. As a side effect of his diabetes medication, client's current weight has ballooned up to over 100kg. Client relies on helper in his daily activities because of his weight and mobility issues. However, salary of helper is the one of the family's more costly expenditure. With an electronic wheelchair, client will be able to become more independent and slowly depend lesser on helper. The goal is for client to gain confidence and independence so that there will not be a need to further engage a helper in the future and hence, reducing the financial burden and stress of the family.

name: Wheelchair - Urgent
description: Please contact Social Worker Seelvi at Seelvi.Nadarasan@thkmc.org.sg to liaise. Client is temporarily unfit to work due to mental health conditions. She had recently fractured her right leg and unable to move around. She is requesting for wheelchair urgently.

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Tanjong Pagar
contact.name: Navarraj

name: Wheelchair (Battery-Operated)
description:
Client recently had a fall and has suffered broken ankle and is unable to walk. 
She would depend largely on the wheelchair and her current one had given way.

Would prefer suitable donor to provide delivery :)

name: Personal Mobility Aid
description:
Client has Parkinson's Disease and suffered a stroke last year. He requires a personal mobility aid to attend his weekly Physiotherapy sessions and appointments at the hospital. 
Wife is the sole breadwinner of the family of 7 and is unable to afford a new personal mobility aid.

name: Motorized Wheelchair
description: Client is a single mother of 4 children. Her 4th child has Dandy-walker syndrome and low IQ. Client is unemployed due to health issues and is reliant on SSO FA and St. Vincent De Paul FA. She recently had difficulty walking due to backpain and is now required to use a wheelchair when travelling outside of the home. Client is reliant on her children to push her while in the chair, which is a strain on their body. Client would gain more independence if she received a motorised wheelchair.

name: Milk and Diapers
description: Client has a large family with 4 young children. The family has high living expenses, and client's husband is the sole breadwinner of the family. Due to some family issues, her husband is not providing for the children's basic needs and client has to do it on her own. Client just started a new job, but she is unsure when she will get her pay and if she will even make it pass the probation period. Client does not have enough cash at the moment to buy milk and diapers for her infant, and it would be very helpful if a donor could provide her with 2 stage 2 Friscolac Gold 1.8kg tins, as well as 3 packets of L diapers (Drypers) to meet her child's basic needs for now while she figure things out. Thank you very much for helping the family.

Her eldest son is waiting to be enlisted in NS and her youngest is still studying. Client has significant financial hardship as she is unable to meet the basic household needs. Client requested for a television as her TV has broken down. As client has lack of funds, she hopes to have a donor who can sponsor the delivery.

name: Digital Television or Television with Digital Set-top box
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) lives alone and does not have a television at home.  
  
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a Digital-Ready TV or TV with Digital Set-top Box (Medium size) to help the client stay occupied at home. 
  
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Yu Xin at 8292 2205. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to THK Cluster Support @ Geylang office at 93 Paya Lebar Way. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: Senior-friendly Phone
description:
A low-income elderly client of Thye Hua Kwan Moral Charities (THKMC) is illiterate with hearing and speech impairment. He is dependent on his older brother, Mr Aziz for his instrumental activities of daily living. Mr Aziz also has health conditions, including a blurred vision and would greatly benefit from a senior-friendly phone to enable him to reach out to his friends or social service providers easily.   
 
On behalf of the client, THKMC is seeking for a donation of a senior-friendly phone so that the client’s caregiver (Mr Aziz) is able to use it easily, stay in contact with his friends and reach out to call someone in times of emergency.  
  
Sample of a senior-friendly mobile phone in this link:    
https://www.qoo10.sg/item/INO-CP168-4G-SENIOR-PHONE-FREE-DESKTOP-CHARGER-1-YEAR-LOCAL-WARRANTY/685131278?banner_no=1305330
 
If you know of someone who has the item for donation, please contact caseworker Rosyiidah at 9386 6151. We appreciate if the donor could deliver the item to THK Cluster Support @ Geylang office at 93 Paya Lebar Way. For more information on THKMC, do visit: https://www.thkmc.org.sg

name: 21st Century Vitamin C-1000 Orange (Chewable) (30 Vegetarian Tablets)
description:
Patient is a 39 years old female who is bed-bound and uncommunicative since 2018. She is married with a four-year old son. Patient’s husband is unemployed as he is the full-time caregiver for her. It is recommended by the doctor for patient to consume this supplement - 21st Century Vitamin C-1000 Orange (Chewable) (30 Vegetarian Tablets). Patient is required to consume 1 tablet each day. The family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables due to husband’s unemployment.

The item can be found here: https://shopee.sg/21st-Century-Vitamin-C-1000-Orange-(Chewable)-(30-Vegetarian-Tablets)-i.32333759.448121856 (Shopee).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can Whatsapp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: TENA DIAPER M (PANTS)
description: A male client age 41 years old, staying 3 room flat requires Diaper Pants size M for daily use.  He was diagnosed with Colon Cancer, stage 3 on July 2016 and  relapse on 2019. After his major operation to remove his colon recently, his weight reduce from 50kg to 39kg. He having complication on his anal fistula. Doctor have tried all treatment (drain the abscess, flush the pus, stronger antibiotics treatment) but it not suit for him. Therefore, he went for major surgery to remove his all rectum area and need to wear stoma and diaper permanently. His wife is not working. Client have 3 children and all still schooling.

description: Low-income family of three (parents & 10 month old). Parents are currently undergoing full-time courses to upgrade themselves while working odd jobs. Their current laptop is faulty and they are in need of a laptop to attend their course.

description: Family consisting of parents with school-going children. Father is the sole breadwinner as mother has health issues. Family is unable to afford to buy a laptop and they require it for their child’s home-based learning. (Omai)

contact.org: THK Family Service Centre @ Bedok North
contact.name: Teddy Fu

name: Laptop
description: Single-parent with a school-going child who requires a laptop for school work and projects. Their current laptop is faulty. Family hopes to get a laptop that is not too heavy.

name: Commode
description:
Elderly lady living in a rental flat. 
She'll require a commode due to her fraility and high fall risks in the toilet.

name: Tena L size pull up diapers
description:
Elderly lady living alone in a rental flat. 
Due to her fraility, she was advised by the therapist to wear pull up diapers.

name: TENA Super XL Pants
description:
Patient is a 42 years old male who is single and living with his elderly mother in a two-room HDB rental flat. His mother is his main caregiver. He requires assistance with his daily activities and is totally dependent. The family does not have any income and is reliant on various assistances for daily subsistence. Thus, the family has difficulty affording the ongoing consumables for patient.

Patient uses TENA Super XL Pants. The item can be found here: https://www.watsons.com.sg/pants-super-adult-diapers-xl-12s/p/BP_57783 (Watsons) or https://www.guardian.com.sg/tena-pants-super-xl-12pcs/p/171935 (Guardian).

Kindly arrange the donated items to be delivered to patient’s house directly. You can WhatsApp Jia Ling at 82479135 for details. Thank you!

name: Tena Pull up diapers (L size) - 3 packs
description: Pt is known to SCS home hospice service and would benefit from assistance for diapers.

name: MamyPoko Pants Extra Dry Skin, Boys, XXXL, 18-35kg (4 Packets)
description: MamyPoko Pants Extra Dry Skin, Boys, XXXL, 18-35kg (4 Packets) This family of 4 is under financial assistance, and has a teenage child with special needs that requires Diapers on a daily basis. Mother is a responsible lady who tries her best to support her family despite her own health condition. The donation of diapers would be very helpful in helping family tide through their challenges.

name: Diapers (Lifree)
description: Recently divorced elderly, 70 years old, requires assistance with getting diapers as she is unable to afford them on her own. Due to her recent change in marital status, she is no longer supported by her children or ex-husband, leaving her with rental and bill arrears. Hoping to find a donor who would be able to sponsor some adult diapers so she may alleviate costs for her medical needs. She prefers Lifree brand as it does not cause discomfort to her.

name: L size - Tena Pull up diapers
description:
Client is an elderly man in his 90s, living with dementia. 
He was recently discharged from hospital, and family requires around 1 carton of pull-up diapers while he's recuperating.

name: Glucose test strips
description: I have 3 elderlies who are currently using the Accuchek Performa Blood Glucose Meters. I am trying to get them to be testing their blood sugar level x02 times a day for their diabetic condition. They would need a regular supply of the test strips. If you can assist with this request, please email me or text me at michaeltiew@slec.org.sg or 92357508. thank you.

name: Adult Diaper, Pants Type
description: Elderly woman who is wheelchair bound needs adult diaper size L, pants type. Thank you in advance!

name: Adult tape diapers sized M (Institution Pack)
description: Looking for adult tape diapers sized M (Institution Pack) for client living in residential care services who has colon cancer condition. Sample item is found here https://www.dnrwheels.com/products/tena-institution-pack-diaper?variant=13994896425018
